meanings.definition: To engrave a design or image onto a surface using a photographic process.
meanings.sent1: She carefully photoengraves her initials on the metal plate.
meanings.sent2: The artist photoengraves intricate patterns onto the glass.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to photoengrave its tiny pawprints on the tree bark.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to perfection photoengraves his work into the minds of all who see it.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays seemed to photoengrave the landscape with golden light.

meanings.definition: Designs or images that have been engraved onto a surface using a photographic process.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient photoengraves of mythical creatures.
meanings.sent2: She collected rare photoengraves of famous landmarks.
meanings.sent3: The photoengraves in the book seemed to come alive under the dim light.
meanings.sent4: His office walls were adorned with beautiful photoengraves of nature scenes.
meanings.sent5: The photoengraves in the gallery captured the essence of the city in black and white.
